name: Jueyun Chili Chicken
effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6-12% for 300 seconds.
description: Cold chicken mixed in dressings. The finesse technique used in mixing the dish retained the freshness of the delightful juice contained within the chicken. The glowing gold chicken skin hides a mildly hot flavor underneath.
source: Purchase (Chef Mao at Wanmin Restaurant in Liyue Harbor, Liyue, AR20+)
